category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TcActionColumnWidthPreferences
preference.preference_description: Specifies the column widths displayed in the action table. Valid Values: One or more integers as values; each integer defines the column width in characters. The first value set in this preference defines the column width of the first value set in the TcActionColumnPreferences user preference, and so on.
